pages.text: The $(item)Canning Machine$() uses Zaps to fill Cans.$(br2)$(item)Canned Food$() fills 4 points of hunger and saturation each. The empty Can is returned after eating.$(br2)$(item)Spray Paint$() allows you to paint machines from their default white theme to black and back.
It costs 200âš¡ to fill a Can.$(br2)Without $(l:ftbic:items/upgrades)upgrades$(), it accepts only LV current.
